about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER

This version of IDILI is a prototype that's still under development and does not represent the final quality of the game. We will continuously work to improve it and update with new content.


THE STORY

John and Ellie just wanted to visit the beautiful island of Sardinia and experience it's vibrant culture and history. But soon John finds himself alone in the archeologic park of the Nuraghe Is Paras, isolated and scared but resolute to find Ellie and solve one of Sardinia's darkest and oldest secrets.

Caught in a conflict between ancient forces and dark secrets that have haunted the island for millennia, as John you must use all your wits and cunning to avoid the dark presence haunting the forest and reunite with Ellie. But the more of the mystery you unravel the more you will find that things on Sardinia are not what they seem on the surface.

THE ISLAND

Brave the horror of the Sardinian myths and legends as you try to survive and solve ancient mysteries in this original First-Person Horror experience set in the context of the Mediterranean island of Sardinia.

IDILI aims to bring the beautiful Island of Sardinia to life with the power of Unreal Engine 5. The Archeologic Park Is Paras is inspired by a real place in the village of Isili in the heart of Sardinia's south. All of the cultural and archeologically significant places and artefacts are heavily inspired by their real world counter parts and were meticulously handcrafted by the team.

THE SOUND

IDILI takes immersion very seriously. That is why nearly all of the sounds and music in the game are unique sounds you will not find anywhere else. We worked very hard to create the creepy and eyry atmosphere of a typical Sardinian summer night and let the player be engulfed by the thick and heavy soundscape.

THE TEAM
Megalith Interactive Studios is a young team made up of people with no specific experience in the world of the video game industry. We are passionate, independent and zero budget.

IDILI is the result of a common effort and with it we want to show our skills and try to enter the world of video games with a project that comes out in early access because it wants to be much more than what will come out as the first release.

The assets that make up the game map are 100% original, except for the vegetation, and for this we are very proud as the archaeology and the places of culture and tradition shown in the game try to be a faithful reproduction of the original counterpart.

content_descriptors.notes: IDILI is a horror game. You get hunted by a monster and the design of the monster is body horror. When the monster catches you there will be multiple animations where the player dies in different gruesome ways.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel/AMD CPU, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Hexa-Core Intel/AMD CPU, 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: IDILI is a first-person Survival Horror video game. Discover Sardinian tradition and experience its terrifying legends as they come to life in your hands. Investigate, explore, escape. You will have to survive with all your strength to uncover its secrets.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support
